title: Kotk, Kerman
text: Kotk (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Godak) is a village in <a href="Javaran%20Rural%20District">Javaran Rural District</a>, <a href="Hanza%20District">Hanza District</a>, <a href="Rabor%20County">Rabor County</a>, <a href="Kerman%20Province">Kerman Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 86, in 22 families.
